name: Hot mess (itch) (Rio Studios)
description:
A very serious cuisine training application

Hot Mess is a game developed for Global Game Jam 2022 made in 48 hours.

Today is shaping up to be a Hot Mess.

The Chef and Sous-Chef went home early to work on some game jam and didn't get the ingredients ready for today! 

Worst yet, the local football team just lost the cup so the clients are cranky and impatient...

Let's hope that we can maintain the reputation of our illustrious and refined establishment.

Controls

The left side is played with the keyboard

  • 'A' and 'D' are used to choose the different kitchen tools to prepare the ingredients
  • The Spacebar is used to select the tool and play it's minigames

The right side is played with the mouse

  • Grab and throw the ingredients to the chef and prepare the hotdog in the right order
